issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I am able to build and run my app via appcelerator. But I have to now generate the iPA and for that I am opening the app's xcode project in xcode and then generating the iPA after archiving it. 

But when I run the iPA on device, I get the following error:

Couldn't find module: lib/format for architecture: arm64

Please suggest as to how I can fix it.
fields.summary: Couldn't find module: lib/format for architecture: arm64

comments.body:
Hello,

Thanks for reporting this. Can you please test this issue on 8.0.0.GA? If the issue reproduces, please share the complete console logs.

Hi [~mr.jatinjoshi.mca@gmail.com], We have not heard back from you since our last response. Is this still an issue for you? If yes, You can follow the guideline mentioned in the doc to resolve the problem: [Couldn't find module: X for architecture: X|https://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/iOS_Module_64-bit_Support-section-src-43291229_safe-id-aU9TTW9kdWxlNjQtYml0U3VwcG9ydC1Db3VsZG4ndGZpbmRtb2R1bGU6WGZvcmFyY2hpdGVjdHVyZTpY]

Let us know the update.

Thanks!

Hello,
Just passing as update here. Are you able to get that sorted out? Â Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.

Hello!
Hope you are doing fine today.
Would you please reply us regarding previous reviews? We are looking forward to your response.
